website_summaries.verdict: A nice pick if you prefer natural products. Peasant scents and moisturizers – but the set is a bit pricier than others we considered.
pros: They are made with all-natural ingredients, which means these bath bombs don't have artificial colors or fillers, and aren't tested on animals
Each one is individually wrapped and labeled for specific uses
cons: The set is just a bit costlier than others on our list, considering you only get 6 for the price

customer_reviews.title: Improved my homes resale value
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these to help clear out some boulders and as protection against zombies. Unfortunately these are not that kind of bomb. Now I have moist and floral boulders. The zombies really did benefit from these. They look and smell much better now. That was a problem before. Hordes of the walking dead can destroy your property values. Unless they are perfumed and moisturized. Making the zombies presentable is very important if you're selling your house. Not how I intended to use them, but they still did a great job! Nice moist smelly boulders and zombies for me!
customer_reviews.author: John J. Topper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE your products! I asked my Friend for a bath bomb recommendation, and she said yours were amazing. I got on Amazon and ordered a six pack of the bath bombs, plus one of your face masks and a face scrub. I can honestly say that my daughter and I went through the whole box of bath bombs in a week; and I absolutely love the scrub and mask, too! I definitely give all three of the products I ordered a 5/5 rating.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Would be a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product as a birthday gift. It would be a lovely gift if the product wasn't expired.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: My Wife loved them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Valentine's gift for my Wife and she absolutely loved them. They're a bit pricey for only 6, but the ingredients were too notch according to her. Also, I'm happy to support American companies.
customer_reviews.author: caclark74

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Used two and gave others as gifts. They were great and didn’t have the fake coloring for me to soak in that other bath Bombs have.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous all natural bath bombs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath bombs! They all smell fantastic & make such a wonderful soothing & relaxing bath. They are good sized bombs that are enough for my large tub. I only use all natural body products & am so grateful for a company who is committed to making quality all natural products!
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: OMG I am a bath hound. I usually use epsom, bath and body light bubble and lavender oil. I thought i would try these and within two weeks they are gone. My son used one after his football practice he thought they were awesome. Some people mentioned a mess after the tub but I didn't find it bad at all, a quick wipe out and that was it. I would love these always..... I do wish they were a tad cheaper as I think they are more luxery than my regular everyday economical. I figure if I can limit to one a week they would be a great "me" treat.
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: Terrible overpowering smell
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these so bad because they are organic and not filled with chemicals like other products... but I have to say the smell was SO overpowering & awful that we had to turn the fan on, leave the room for 10 min and bring an air purifier into the bathroom just to make it tolerable for my daughter to breathe while bathing! So so bad! Will not be buying this ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much grit and residue
customer_reviews.text: I expect a little residue from a bath bomb but this took real scrubbing to get it all off. The scent was lovely out of the wrapper but quickly evaporated. In moments I couldn’t even detect any fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Gift purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift to send to a friend and she loved it. She said that the the bath bombs smelled great and she felt great after using them. I would send this again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I used the Just Relax so far and it was ok. But, they are not scented as I would have liked. I did not not a difference with my skin being moisturized. . The packaging is great, but not product I thought would be better for the price. Maybe I will like the others better, probably will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Virgoa

customer_reviews.title: Great Skin/ Very Strongly scented
customer_reviews.text: I love they way they make my skin feel. They work beautifully. But the smell is very very strong it's 3 days later and my bathroom is still smells like the first day I use them. I had to take a shower to dull the smell on me.
customer_reviews.author: Fizzgig

customer_reviews.title: ... shared with friends and they still quite seemed to enjoy them. They had pleasant smell and made your ...
customer_reviews.text: Bath bombs came in broken/deteriorating but had some shared with friends and they still quite seemed to enjoy them. They had pleasant smell and made your skin smell good and look better. Brought it up to the seller the conditions they came in and they offered a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: had bugs!!
customer_reviews.text: one out of the two bombs used had small bugs in it. Understandably so, my wife is afraid to use the others.
customer_reviews.author: jason schiraldi

customer_reviews.title: Treat Yourself
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely. Looks great. Smells amazing. Moisturizing. Great gift for a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Cmr1960

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly bath time
customer_reviews.text: I have used two of these bath bombs so far and all I can say is "heavenly". The oils in the bath bombs made my skin feel silky smooth and the epsom salts were very relaxing. I used the one called "bedtime ritual" with my 11 mo son and he slept very well afterwards. He also enjoyed watching the ball fizz in the water. It may seem like a lot to pay for a bath, but I say it's well worth it to have high quality ingredients and no chemical crap. Plus we don't take a bath every day, so it just makes it that much more special.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a treat!
customer_reviews.text: These Bath Bombs are the Bomb! No chemicals, natrially scented and so luxurious! I'm a busy mom and don't have time to go to a spa to unwind. With these amazing bath bombs I can have my own organic spa in my very own home. Most bath products are over purfumed and have a ton of chemicals in them. So I'm so happy to have found an organic product that has a beautiful natural scent! The packaging is gorgeous. I'll definitely be giving these away to my fellow mommy friends. Love, love, love these!
customer_reviews.author: Greg L Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my secret santa gift this year for work and the person I gifted it to was in love. I'm about to order another batch just for myself. They come in a super cute decorate box and the list of ingredients of each bath bomb on each side. Everything is natural and the moment you open the box the smell hits you, super delicious. I typically buy from Lush, but according to the ingredients these are up to par and far more better price. I really love these!
customer_reviews.author: nicole bilbao

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasure it was to use all of these. I bought them because we were going on a trip for our anniversary and I wanted to have a spa quality bath bomb's theses did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah walter

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful gift to pamper yourself
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift from my step daughter a packaging was beautiful and she was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.author: Sharon White/Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bath comfort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect package with great scented bath bombs I would buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan before we even try it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a birthday gift for my daughter who is turning sixteen soon so I can not comment on her experience yet, but I love the packaging and when I opened the box to make sure that everything was in order I was truly mesmerized by the wonderful essence that filled the air. Not overwhelming perfume but instead it was a gentle natural essence. Can't wait to hear my daughters feedback so I can plan ahead for future holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Was a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law loved these and asked me to gift her with more of the same in the future they even contain bath oil.
customer_reviews.author: pretty pearline

customer_reviews.title: Left a ring around tub
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, does what it's supposed to do. Smells nice, nice packaging. Smaller in size than expected, but it works well as it's supposed to. I just didn't like the thick ring at the top of the tub. I only used it in the tub for a quick foot bath.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Vecchione

customer_reviews.title: Love the selection
customer_reviews.text: Love the selection and I enjoy each scent in this box, it fizzed perfectly and didn't take forever to disintegrate. I felt relaxed when using them
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M.

customer_reviews.title: No dyes, but a good-sized fizzy bath bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for bath bombs that didn't have dyes (I don't need that on my skin or tub, thank you) but still fizzed and smell good. Came across these and decided to try it out. These worked great. I loved the smell and they still have the fun fizzy action. I have somewhat sensitive skin and these didn't bother me at all. I'm giving two from this pack to a couple of gals in my family for them to try out!
customer_reviews.author: tinyshinycello

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for myself and for my daughter for Christmas. I love that these bath bombs are natural and fresh (no colorants or perfumes). They are great quality and dissolve quickly in the bath. I feel relaxed and my skin feels great after soaking with one of these. The packaging is also nice - natural and elegant looking. I will buy these again and so I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Philly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, dye-free, product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to sit in a bath of synthetic (or any, really) dye. These bath bombs only have ingredients you can understand. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: lazy amazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Non Toxic Bath Bomb
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my girls for Christmas and we love them. Smells great, no toxic ingredients, and fizz beautifully! We had fun and they had our skin feeling great.

customer_reviews.title: Best bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my girlfriend. She loves them. I bought a second box to surprise her with later.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bowlby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: These bathbombs were a perfect gift for my father or for anyone really who just needs good soak at the end of a long work day! Although I haven't tried them myself, I was told that they made for a lovely bath for sore muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: da bomb!
customer_reviews.text: the packaging is great and i love the fact that the bath bombs were really diverse. great for any situation. from relaxation, to sleepy time, to even a joint pain bath bomb. i was pleasantly surprised and i would most definitely buy this again in the future as a gift or for myself.

customer_reviews.title: WOW these bath bombs are amazing! I bought these to give as a gift ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW these bath bombs are amazing! I bought these to give as a gift and ended up keeping them for myself! I would feel guilty but these bath bombs soothed all my troubles away! Each bath bomb contains oils which soften the skin and makes for such a wonderful relaxing experience!
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: I think the person really did like them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present and was told all of them smell the same. If smell was not an issue, I think the person really did like them.

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product. I am 6 months pregnant and really enjoy a bath. These make my skin so soft and I feel relaxed afterward. They work so well, that last night I had my 6 year old son who was complaining of lag pain use one. He loved it and I noticed he slept better. Now my only problem is him not using them all!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the bath bomb lover.
customer_reviews.text: Fiancée loved using these in our garden bath. No complaints. She loved the scent and didn’t make a mess in the tub afterwards.

They look very well made and love that they are all natural. They also make nice small individual gifts for friends.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bath bombs, very nice packing, and MADE IN THE USA
customer_reviews.text: Nice bath bombs, they come nicely packed, and they are MADE IN THE USA. Would for sure buy these again despite there price they made my family members skin feel really nice.
customer_reviews.author: LewisAK

customer_reviews.title: Best bath bombs my daughter and I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best bath bombs my daughter and I have ever used. Not chemically in any way. I bought them as a special treat for my daughter's visit home from college (as they don't have bathtubs in their dorm rooms), and she was absolutely thrilled! I will be buying many more for our own use and also a lovely gift for friends.
customer_reviews.author: brownieshirl

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing like creating taking a bath -- it's a healing experience ...
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing like creating taking a bath -- it's a healing experience not only for your physical being but also for you mind and soul. These bath bombs were a stocking stuffer for my daughter who loved the scents and themes for each "bomb." They are not only relaxing but super duper fun to have as our bed time ritual. Love this product!

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift

customer_reviews.title: These are super nice. I love the different categories
customer_reviews.text: These are super nice.I love the different categories. Not sure if it is psychological, but they seem to actually work.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift, They smell amazing!

I love the organic look and packaging also the natural ingredients are the reason I purchased these . The even smelled amazing through the packaging! I cannot wait to gift these and hear how they turn out. I will be buying some for myself in the future.

They smell wonderful and I am pleased with other products I purchased with this. I will try to update after using but I don't think I will have any complaints~ Can't wait to use them!

customer_reviews.title: Each Of them have left my skin soft and smelling great. I noticed that I barely even needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are the bomb! Each Of them have left my skin soft and smelling great. I noticed that I barely even needed to use lotion as I normally do as my skin was so soft and moisturized. They were so relaxing and I will definitely continue to buy these.

customer_reviews.title: I really really enjoyed these. They arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really really enjoyed these. They arrived quickly, they were a wonderful size, and smelt wonderful. A tad pricey but I would buy them again anytime.

customer_reviews.text: I really like these! They smell nice but are not overpowering. I have chemical sensitivities and have to be very careful with products. I will purchase these again!

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic. They smell wonderful and leave my skin moisturized ...
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and almost every bath bomb, salt or oil I use leaves me itchy or oily. These are fantastic. They smell wonderful and leave my skin moisturized and not irritated. In my last trimester of pregnancy and I’m going to order another set. Love them.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as a gift for my best friend, a bath bomb aficionado
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my best friend, a bath bomb aficionado, for her birthday, & she loved them so much I bought her 2 sets for Christmas. She was overjoyed, as she'd been trying to not finish them too quickly. Looks like I've got Christmas & birthday presents covered as long as they keep making these awesome bath bombs...

customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mom who has non-diabetic neuropathy and she loved it. Most bath bombs make her feet tingle and these left her muscles relaxed and without extra sensation. I'd definitely buy these again for her knowing that these are the only ones so far to not effect her nerves negatively.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! I purchased these as a gift and the ...
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I purchased these as a gift and the recipient LOVED them. I also regret not getting myself any! I'll definitely be buying more products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Emmala

customer_reviews.title: and I am told they are awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift, and I am told they are awesome...large size & smell wonderful. Recommended & a good value
customer_reviews.author: Emily Curtis

customer_reviews.title: The product is great. The only problem is that they aren't as ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. The only problem is that they aren't as big as you would expect after they advertise to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Bath Bombs Gift Set - 6 Large Natural & Organic, Birthday Gifts for Women, Bath Bomb Gifts for Her, Bath Bombs for Kids, Bath Bombs for Women With Shea Butter, Bath Salts and Essential Oil Scented
feature_bullets: THE GIFT OF RELAXATION: The perfect gift for EVERY occasion is just one click away. Our bath bomb gift set is the perfect way to say “Thank you for being amazing.” Each set is gorgeously packaged and fit for royalty. Filled with a variety of lush, essential oil infused organic bath bombs. you're sure to impress with this set. This year, get something truly special for her.

SHOW HER HOW SPECIAL SHE IS: There's a reason why our all natural Bath Bombs have become the # 1 gift for women. Whether it's Mother's Day, wife or girlfriend's birthday, bridal shower favors, or "just because..." this gift set is guaranteed to make her smile. Crafted from ingredients like dead sea salt that naturally support the skin and entice the senses, they’re the perfect treat to turn your bathroom into an oasis after a long day.

CHOOSE YOUR FLAVOR: No two days are the same, so your baths shouldn't be either. We’ve packed six different bath salt flavors into one set, so you’ll always be able to choose how you relax. Sore muscles? There’s a bath ball for that. Feeling under the weather? There’s a bomb for that. Just want to chill out? We’ve got you covered. This kind of selection means your soaks will never be dull.

ALL-NATURAL INDULGENCE: What do you get for the woman who has everything? Serenity, Relaxation, and Peace of Mind. You can give this gift without harsh, toxic, and unsustainable junk. Infused with goodness like organic shea butter, these bath fizzies are made of only safe, natural, earth-friendly ingredients. Moisturized skin, relaxed muscles, and senses pampered - all free of worry about what you’re exposing yourself or a loved one to. We don’t think there’s any better way to indulge.

LOVE IT OR LET US KNOW: We know you’re gonna love what our bath bombs can do. We’re so confident that we’ll even guarantee it. Every product we sell comes with a 30 day, 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee. If at any point over the next year you don’t love your gift set, just send it back and we’ll give you a full refund – no awkward questions required.
